description: Core wound, need for acceptance. Let's remember your worth.

art.title: Shame Shadow Integration
art.instruction: Draw your shadow self carrying shame, then light embracing it. Integration, not elimination.
art.affirmation: I integrate my shadow with love and accept all parts of myself

art.title: Worth Declaration Art
art.instruction: Create bold art declaring your inherent worth with powerful colors and symbols.
art.affirmation: I am worthy of love exactly as I am

art.title: Mask Removal Art
art.instruction: Draw masks representing shame, then your beautiful, worthy face underneath.
art.affirmation: I remove shame's masks and reveal my true, worthy self

breathwork.title: Worth Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe in inherent worth, breathe out shame and self-judgment.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe in my worth and release all shame

breathwork.title: Heart Love Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe love directly into your heart center, especially to shamed parts.
breathwork.affirmation: I send love to all parts of myself through healing breath

somatic.title: Shame Posture Correction
somatic.instruction: Notice shame's collapsed posture. Gently straighten, lift head, open chest.
somatic.affirmation: I embody worth through confident, open posture

somatic.title: Loving Self-Embrace
somatic.instruction: Wrap arms around yourself with complete acceptance of all parts.
somatic.affirmation: I embrace all parts of myself with unconditional love

cbt.title: Shame vs. Guilt Clarity
cbt.instruction: Separate 'I did bad' (guilt) from 'I am bad' (shame). Actions vs. core identity.
cbt.affirmation: My actions don't define my worth - I am inherently valuable

rebt.title: Perfect Person Demand
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I must be perfect to be worthy.' Worth is inherent, not earned.
rebt.affirmation: My worth is inherent, not earned through performance

neural.title: Worth Installation
neural.instruction: Repeatedly visualize and feel inherent worth. Program as baseline identity.
neural.affirmation: I am inherently worthy of love and belonging

journaling.title: Compassionate Shame Story
journaling.instruction: Rewrite shame story from place of compassion and understanding.
journaling.affirmation: I rewrite my story with compassion and reclaim my worth

eft.title: Core Shame Healing
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I carry deep shame, I am worthy of love exactly as I am.'
eft.affirmation: I heal shame at its core and reclaim inherent worth

emdr.title: Worth Memory Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of feeling valued through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry deep worth and value within me always

yoga.title: Heart Opening for Worth
yoga.instruction: Heart-opening poses to counter shame's collapse. Open to your worth.
yoga.affirmation: I open my heart and reclaim my inherent worth
